'''Moana Character Pack'''<ref>{{Mcnet|moana-and-xbox-characters-come-minecraft|Moana and Xbox Characters Come to Minecraft!|January 30, 2018|Marsh Davies}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] consisting of 25 skins of characters from the popular ''Disney'' animated fantasy film ''[[wikipedia:Moana (2016 film)|Moana]]''.

|[[w:Moana (character)|Moana]]
|[[File:Moana skin render.png|60px]]
|Main protagonist of the film, the daughter of a Polynesian chief who is chosen by the ocean itself to recover a mystical artifact, voiced by actress [[w:Auliʻi Cravalho|Auliʻi Cravalho]].
|
|-
|[[w:Maui (Moana)|Maui]]
|[[File:Maui skin render.png|60px]]
|Deuteragonist of the film, based off the mythical figure [[w:Māui|Māui]] in Polynesian mythology, voiced by actor and wrestler [[w:Dwayne Johnson|Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson]].
|
|-
|[https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Tamatoa Tamatoa]
|[[File:Tamatoa skin render.png|60px]]
|Secondary antagonist within the film, a ginormous crab who hoards [[gold]] and other valuables, voiced by comedian and musician [[Jemaine Clement]].
|
|-
|[https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Pua_(Moana) Pua]

|[https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Gramma_Tala Gramma Tala]
